attributes.action: Knight Ross Brawn for services to formula one & motor sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following jenson button winning the f1 world title yesterday, i think that ross brawn having won f1 titles with ferrari & benetton and now with his own team should be awarded a knight hood for services to motor sport and f1

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
